casebody.data:
LENARD O. REICHEL v. THE UNITED STATES [No. 45440. Decided April 5, 1943] Mr. Fred W. Shields for the plaintiff. Messrs. King & King were on the brief. Mr. L. R. Mehlinger, with whom was Mr. Assistant Attorney General Francis M. Shea, for the defendant.

No opinion found.Click here to view source material.
